thread.title: BRIEF-Clean Harbors Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.12

title: BRIEF-Clean Harbors Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.12
text:
May 2, 2018 / 11:33 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Clean Harbors Reports Q1 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.12 Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Clean Harbors Inc:
* CLEAN HARBORS ANNOUNCES FIRST-QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.22
* Q1 REVENUE $749.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $732.9 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* CONFIRMS 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA AND ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW GUIDANCE
* CLEAN HARBORS REITERATED ITS FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE IN RANGE OF $440 MILLION TO $480 MILLION
* COMPANY’S GUIDANCE IS BASED ON ANTICIPATED 2018 NET INCOME IN RANGE OF $12 MILLION TO $51 MILLION
* FOR 2018, CLEAN HARBORS EXPECTS TO GENERATE ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW IN RANGE OF $125 MILLION TO $155 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
